title: Cierres continuos
content: Llevo meses con problemas con Mozilla. Se cuelga y me pide cerrar el programa. Suele suceder cuando estoy cargando archivos adjuntos, pero es demasiado frecuente. Ya lo restablecí 3 veces, también lo desinstalé y volví a instalar. Ya no sé qué mas hacer. Tengo Windows 11
creator: volga.depina

title: Downloading English as my first language for the browser
content: I want to get rid of the French language in my browser!!!!!!!!!!!!
creator: domi246

title: Google search page not displaying correctly in troubleshooting mode, but does display correctly in private window
content: When I do a Google search, the icons/buttons for Web, Images, Shopping, etc. do not display correctly. I can only see the tops of the buttons. I tried disabling my plugins but that didn't help. I launched FF in troubleshooting mode and that still did not resolve it. So far, I've only found two ways to fix it. I can either view it in a private window or I can use the User Agent Switcher plugin to force it to Chrome. This is something that just recently started, probably beginning with v119 or even 119.01.
creator: Neiby
